name: European Association for Aquatic Mammals
memberOrga: EAAM operates under a MOU with the European Association of Zoos and Aquariums and in cooperation with the Alliance of Marine Mammal Parks and Aquariums.
goal:
The Mission of the European Association for Aquatic Mammals (EAAM) is to;
1. Promote the free exchange of knowledge among individuals and institutions to further scientific progress pertaining to research, medical care, training, education, conservation, management and other aspects of aquatic mammals; and
2. Support and encourage public awareness and education concerning the biology, habitats, threats to wild populations, and programs and measures for the conservation of aquatic mammals.
euInitiatives:
- Evaluation and implementation of the EU Animal Welfare Strategy
- Legislative and policy developments concerning animal health, welfare and conservation
- the REFIT of the Zoos Directive
